content: x x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 17 *k2tog k5 3 1 0 x x x sl1* repeat to end of round 98 70 42 28 x x x sts for worsted weight version only rnds 18 & 19 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing round 19 *k6 4 2 x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 21 *k2tog k4 2 0 x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round 84 56 28 x x x x sts for dk version only rnds 22 & 23 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing round 23 *k5 3 x x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 25 *k2tog k3 1 x x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round 70 42 x x x x x sts round 27 *k4 2 x x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round round 29 *k2tog k2 0 x x x x x sl1* repeat to end of round 56 28 x x x x x sts for sport weight version only rnds 30 & 31 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches skip down to finishing round 31 *k3 sl1* repeat to end of round round 33 *k2tog k1 sl1* repeat to end of round 42 sts round 35 *k2 sl1* repeat to end of round round 37 *k2tog sl1* repeat to end of round 28 sts rnds 38 & 39 *k2tog* repeat to end of round pull yarn through remaining 7 stitches finishing weave in ends block if desired abbreviations co - cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together kfb knit in front and back of stitch p - purl pm place marker round round designating a row when you are knitting in the round on a circular needle sl - slip sts stitches stitch glossary k1 p1 rib with yarn in back *knit 1 stitch bring yarn to front under the right hand needle and purl the next stitch bring yarn to back under the right hand needle* repeat between ** to create the rib pattern k2 decrease insert right hand needle from front to back through the 2nd stitch and the 1st stitch on the left hand needle and knit them together kfb - insert right hand needle into front of aran weight version photo by j punderson model dani stitch as if to knit bring yarn around and pull the stitch through but do not remove the stitch from the left hand needle insert right hand needle into back of the same stitch and wrap yarn around from back to front and bring that stitch through and slide stitch off left hand needle ©copyright 2014 revised 2016 sarah montie handknits po box 178 ih nj 08732 www sarahmontie com info@sarahmontie com this pattern may not be
